title: Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved at Kaloko-Honokohau? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.    Partners Hawaiʻi Pacific Parks Association is a nonprofit cooperating association working in partnership with six national parks in Hawai'i and American Samoa. Proceeds from our park stores support interpretation, educational programs, research projects, publications, and cultural activities.
